p:
Statistical tests were conducted using the STATA software (StataCorp LP, Texas, USA) or R v3.5.2. Proportions were compared using Fisherâ€™s exact. P-values above 0.05 were considered non-significant. The maps in this manuscript were generated using the R software (packages raster v3.0.7
58 and gstat v2.0.3
59, 60 ), based on data published by Kraemer et al.
4 .
